extendedInfo.description: Detailed Anime Season Information and Torrent Downloads + Fansub Tracker. The 1# app to stay up-to-date with all the airing anime shows from Japan! Receive notifications when your favorite fansub group releases an anime on Nyaa (A BitTorrent community focused on Eastern Asian media). Comes included with a Nyaa mobile browser with search and direct download buttons!Tutorial for tracking fansubs: http://animushowtime.appspot.com/tutorial.htmlCustom made for /a/ and the anime torrent community. Features:- A real-time list of all airing anime series from Japan with detailed information about the show.- Quickly configure an automatic torrent tracker for any anime. Never miss a show again!- Receive notifications when your chosen fansub releases are available on Nyaa. Download the torrent directly!- An up-to-date season chart!- A mobile Nyaa browser with search and direct download buttons. Notes: - This app is NOT meant for streaming anime but is an advanced tool for following the current season. - This app is currently in BETA. Please report bugs or crashes with your device name! They really help. Features to be added (soon):- Email notifications- More caching (less loading screens)- A tracker configuration validation, this will check whenever the tracker is configured correctly - Your suggestion?Known bugs:- Android 2.1 and 2.2 devices are not supported at the moment due to some problems.- A crash can occur on certain devices when opening the tracker configuration page.  Contact me if you have any questions, bug reports or even suggestions: edwardvraak@gmail.comTags: Download anime Season HD 1080p 720p torrent 4chan mango animu akarin is love nyaa.eu dragonball z naruto one piece bleach the big three crunchyroll Japanese Animation TV Season aku no hana date a live photo kano red data girl shingeki no kyojin frodo

reviews.title: Needs more options
reviews.comment: search for 480p res Edit notification sound.  Auto open torrent with local client Better quality chart image
reviews.author: ben or dan

reviews.title: Great browser
reviews.comment: Wish I could click the browser hehe
reviews.author: Jejomar Florencio

reviews.title: Native downloader
reviews.comment: The problem with .torrent files not downloading is a failure in the native browser. The only question is if it was done on purpose. I\'d suggest trying to include a native downloader or at least allow for the use of an alternative browser such as firefox.
reviews.author: TheSlight001

reviews.title: Finally! Thank you.
reviews.comment: It\'s great to finally be able to track the new seasons because the episodes sometimes get released early or late and I end up being late to fourms, but now I can be notified when it\'s available and go down it via XDCC or Torrent :p
reviews.author: Jacob Saldana

reviews.title: Simply perfect
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for, best app to go along with MAL for an otaku. Brilliant
reviews.author: Ng Chin Ern

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: No flaws and it does what it\'s suppose to well. Thank you based /a/non

reviews.title: Nice app.
reviews.comment: This app does what it should. Thanks! There\'s no need to check nyaa daily anymore, lol. Useful for someone who doesn\'t turn their PCs on 24/7 like me.

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.comment: Just wanted an app that tells me when my anime is out. This one does that and adds some nice extras.

reviews.title: Very nice, however...
reviews.comment: I\'m not sure if it\'s because of the new update or not, but none of my watch list tracking preferences are saving.  I\'ve set the sub group and the video quality only to confirm the preferences and come back to the anime to find that they weren\'t saved.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I\'m shocked I haven\'t seen this app before. Does exactly what I hoped it would, with a very clean, concise, and useful interface. Being able to specify subgroup and quality is awesome and including the season chart is a very nice touch.
